ADLXApiHelper Main ADLX API wrapper providing safe access to AMD ADLX Library Implements IDisposable for proper resource cleanup ADLXDesktopServicesHelper Wrapper over IADLXDesktopServices providing managed/native accessors and Eyefinity helpers. ADLXDisplayServicesHelper Wrapper over IADLXDisplayServices that provides cached accessors and managed/native enumeration helpers. ADLXException Exception thrown when an ADLX API call fails ADLXGPUTuningServicesHelper Wrapper over IADLXGPUTuningServices selecting the highest available interface and exposing change handling helpers. ADLXHardwareDetection Hardware detection utilities for AMD GPU presence. ADLXListHelpers Helper methods for ADLX list operations. ADLXMultimediaServicesHelper Wrapper over IADLXMultimediaServices exposing managed/native accessors and change handling. ADLXPowerTuningServicesHelper Wrapper over IADLXPowerTuningServices selecting the highest available interface (if extended) and exposing change handling. ADLXSystemServicesHelper Helper wrapper over IADLXSystem exposing per-feature service accessors and GPU enumeration. ADLXUtils AdlxDesktop Flattened desktop faade with identity metadata and display enumeration helpers.
